name: Palbro
desc: Welcome to the world of PalBro, an innovative companion app for Palworld fans.
Inspired by the Pok√©dex, PalBro enhances the gaming experience with detailed info on every Pal.
functionalities: Comprehensive Pal Database: Access names, numbers, stats, attacks, descriptions, drops, and spawn points.
Capture Tracking: Track captures bonuses for each Pal up to 10.
Management of Pals: List obtained and obtainable Pals based on your collection.
Breeding and Combinations: Discover combinations to obtain new species.
Item Search: Find which Pals drop the items you need.
Multi-Game Handling: Track progression across multiple game servers using the gamepad icon in the top bar.
lastDesc: PalBro is developed to provide an intuitive and powerful tool for Palworld players, seamlessly integrating into their gaming routine.

name: Concerto
desc: Introducing Concerto, a personal development project management tool designed to streamline your workflow.
Concerto allows you to jot down project ideas, organize tasks, and allocate time efficiently, all within a user-friendly interface.
functionalities: Idea Management: Easily document and categorize new project ideas.
Task Management: Break down projects into tasks, set priorities, and track progress.
Time Allocation: Assign estimated and actual time to tasks for better planning and retrospection.
Real-time Metrics: Monitor project metrics and progress with integrated Grafana dashboards.
lastDesc: Concerto is a lightweight yet powerful tool developed to assist in managing development projects efficiently.
